Description:
NPE when try to get reportlet in run servlet
Build number:2.3.0.v20071126

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a table, add bookmark "table" to the item.
2. Preview in html, add in url "&__isreportlet=true&__bookmark=table", press enter.

Expected result:
Invalid url parameters should be ignored.

Actual result:
NPE
